item.description:
Formerly of Three Dog Night, Chuck and his band perform all of the hits that made Three Dog Night famous, including the classics that feature his lead vocals: “Joy to the World,” (also known by its opening line: “Jeremiah Was a Bullfrog”) “Easy To Be Hard,” “Old Fashioned Love Song,” “Eli's Comin',” and “One (Is the Loneliest Number).”

 

The Concerts start at 7:30

*Bring Chairs, Blankets, Drinks and munchies to share*

There will also be food available on site.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Chuck Negron, formerly of Three Dog Night
